thread.title: New telecommunications start-up TelcoQ Ltd incorporates in Manchester, UKTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: New telecommunications start-up TelcoQ Ltd incorporates in Manchester, UKTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: New telecommunications start-up TelcoQ Ltd incorporates in Manchester, UKTravelandtourworld.com
text:
New telecommunications start-up TelcoQ Ltd incorporates in Manchester, UK
TelcoQ Ltd., the parentcompany of the TelcoQ, Rotten WiFi and WiFi Rank brands, hasincorporated in the UK and established headquarters at Manchester’s MediaCityUK development.The company – which originated as a telecoms start-up in Lithuania – isaiming to expand its domestic and international presence from its state-of-the-art base in the north-west of England.
TelcoQ Ltd. will operatefrom The Landing on Salford Quays. The development offers a home to ambitious, creative start-ups such as TelcoQ Ltd., as well as larger technology and media firms which are more firmly established in the market. As well as laboratory and studio services, fully supported bynext-generation connectivity, The Landing offers a variety of high-quality managed workspaces.
With super-fast WiFi, 3G and 4Gmobile broadband at its disposal, TelcoQ Ltd. sees The Landing as beingthe ideal base for its growing business. From its new Manchester home,the company will look to increase the profile of its rottenwifi.com,wifirank.com and telcoq.com testing and ranking websites. The city’s business-grade connectivity, excellent communication links and enterprise-focused local economy are seen as being major assets to TelcoQ and its brands going forwards.Arturas Jonkus, Co-founder of TelcoQ Ltd., commented: “We are happy to incorporate in MediaCityUK, which is a very lively and growing technology hub. We find the development very attractive in terms of cost, infrastructure and support from municipal agencies, such as MIDAS. It is the ideal place to locate our business.”
